name: Spellcaster Skirmish
description:
You're a wizard! Unfortunately, as you grow old you forget how to properly do your spells and so your spells may have strange, chaos inducing side-effects on your enemies. 

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim and shoot
  •  ESC or Tab to pause

Look in options to change music volume and sound effect volume

Royalty free music from https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

SFX Generated using https://sfxr.me/
